title: news.com.au — Australia’s #1 news site
text: Finance Minister Mathias Cormann says the Coalition will develop more ways to support drought-stricken farmers and has confirmed providing tax relief is on the table. “We are focused on providing additional support and our policy response to it will continue,” he said. “It is a matter of public record we are assessing further methods.” Earlier, Home Affairs Minister Peter Dutton said the government “put $7 billion on the table already, are working closely with the states and will do whatever it takes to support farmers”.
description: Watch the Latest News.com.au Videos including Featured News Videos and Sports Videos and News Highlights. View more News.com.au Videos and Breaking News and Featured Entertainment Videos online at News.com.au
